description: This course provides supplemental instruction in reading, writing, and critical thinking in conjunction with a designated course. Students practice reading course-specific texts, focusing writing topics, writing essay and short answer exams, developing research habits, identifying and using discipline-specific sources, and writing for general and specific audiences. Supplemental assignments complement writing in the designated course. P/N only. May be repeated once with a different designated course. Prerequisite: concurrent enrollment in a designated full-credit course.
name: Top: Supplemental Writing
notes: For SSS Summer Bridge students only.
prerequisites: concurrent enrollment in a designated full-credit course.
title: Topics: Supplemental Writing
